item.title: HackTheBox - Bashed [no metasploit]
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Reconnaissance export ip=10.10.10.68 Starting with a Nmap TCP scan to discover used ports and services behind, with our usual options: -sC runs defaults Nmap scripts -sV tries to identify the software versions -oA will output the results in files prefixed by nmap_tcp and using the formats xml, nmap and gnmap -p- will scan all ports and not the 1000 usual ones $ sudo nmap -O -sV -sC -oA nmap_tcp -p- $ip Starting Nmap 7.
